p: The applied multistep elution method separated seventeen different compounds ( Figure 4 and Table S1 of the Supplementary Materials). Among them, rosmarinic acid, several minor flavonoids such as aglycones (cirsimaritin and genkwanin) and glycosides (hispidulin 7- O-glucoside and isoscutellarein 7- O-glucoside), and the diterpenoidic constituents, mainly carnosic acid and its oxidation products, were identified.
